content.description:
Compare political party systems in two different AP Comparative Government and Politics course countries. In your response, you should do the following.

(a) Define a political party system.

(b) Describe two different examples of political party systems, each one within a different AP Comparative Government and Politics course country.

(c) Explain how the political party systems shape political efficacy in each country described in (b).
content.question: Respond to all parts of the question.

frqParts.text: Respond to all parts of the question.

unit.text: 4: Party and Electoral Systems and Citizen Organizations

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe political systems, principles, institutions, processes, policies, and behaviors.
